Subject: Re: Drastic times
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Motormaster steps past Killfest and sits down in the commanding chair. He
opens up his energon receiver and puts a cube in. "So who are these enemies
we will be fighting" he says leaning back in the metalic chair, watching
the map display of outerspace. "and how did the Ark get in outerspace?" he
asks roughly.
